textArea: هذا مجرد نموذج للتأكد من اداء الأداة
about_us: A news application is an application that will helps you look at the United States News . Through the application, you can keep all the Articles that you like. Through the application, you can search for any topic and keep it as well. If you want to read more about the topic, you can visit the source of the news and the publisher for him.
